TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SelectionRangeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器，用于在 对象和其他类型之间进行转换。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示单个日期范围内的。The class represents a single date or a range of dates. 此类程序通常与控制，其中它表示的所选和突出显示日期。This class is commonly associated with the control, where it represents the selected and highlighted dates. 类是到一个辅助类，使您能够与其他类型转换，最常见的是字符串。The class is an adjunct class to that enables you to convert to and from other types, most often strings. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类，[通用类型转换](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)，和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class, [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada), and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 切勿创建。You should never create a . 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

returns.span: 如果转换器能执行指定的转换，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类专用化，类型之间进行转换和。The class is specialized to convert between the types and . 因此，方法返回`true`如果`sourceType`形参属于类型。As a result, the method returns `true` if the `sourceType` parameter is of type . 否则，它将遵从基实现此方法调用。Otherwise, it defers the call to the base implementation of this method, .

span.span: The parameter may be , so you should always verify the information.

para.span: 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法专用于转换表示到的日期范围内的值及其表示形式。The method is specialized to convert values that represent a range of dates to their representations. 之外的类型传递给此方法的基类实现。Types other than are passed to the base class implementation of this method.

exception.span: 的类型为 ，但未能分析为表示日期的两个字符串。

span.span: is of type but could not be parsed into two strings representing dates.

exception.span: 的类型为 ，已分析为两个字符串，但其中一个或两个字符串未能成功转换为 类型。

span.span: is of type that was parsed into two strings, but the conversion of one or both into the type did not succeed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来创建它的修改的版本，对现有的不可变对象进行更改。Use the method to make changes to an existing immutable object by creating a modified version of it. 此方法应有`propertyValues`参数存在具有键值的元素`Start`和`End`，每个都有相应值。This method expects the `propertyValues` parameter to have elements with key values of `Start` and `End`, each with the corresponding value.

exception.span: 为 或其 Start 和 End 元素未能转换为 。

span.span: is or its Start and End elements could not be converted into a .
